transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan mam aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji sir aapne kya kehte hai check kiye ek baar leads vagera?
Customer: Abhi.
Customer: Abhi toh nahi ki mam koi.
Executive: Matlab kitne baje karte ho aap mostly matlab check?
Customer: Kabhi main chala leta hu kabhi train chalata hai isliye hota nahi.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Nahi abhi 12:50 ho gaya na toh ek baar nahi li aapne next week?
Customer: Ek minute ruko.
Customer: Ek li hai aaj marble ke liye.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Actually yaha pe aapka concern raise hua tha.
Executive: Toh fir main isko confirm kar rahi hu ki aapko leads vagera aa rahe hai ya nahi aa rahe hai.
Executive: Ye aapne hi call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Kab?
Executive: 22 tarikh ko call aaya tha aapki side se.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine nahi kiya tha.
Executive: 22 25 haan 11:27 pe aaya tha.
Customer: Maine nahi kiya tha mam.
Executive: 132 wale number se hi aaya tha.
Customer: 1321.
Executive: 132 last mein jo number hai na secondary wala.
Customer: Haan nahi woh friend ka hai mera nahi hai.
Executive: Achha actually unhone yaha pe 9696 pe call kiya tha shayad unke paas mera number nahi hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay aur abhi main unko call lagaya toh unhone mera call bhi nahi uthaya.
Customer: Unko lagaya abhi?
Executive: Haan lagaya pata nahi kya hua matlab call chalu tha bol nahi rahe the ya pata nahi uthaya nahi samajh nahi aaya kyuki kuch aawaz hi nahi aayi.
Executive: Aap ek baar unko conscience le lo.
Customer: Ek minute leta hu.
Executive: Unhone unse confirm kar lu kya dikkat hai toh main fir close karu concern ko otherwise.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Haan ji mam boliye.
Executive: Utha liya tha unhone phone? 
Customer: Are mam meri baat suno aapke kaun hai IndiaMART wale naam bhul gaya main toh. Mera toh loan hai hi nahi fir bhi bol rahe hai ki loan le lo loan le lo.
Customer: Loan le lo.
Customer: Aur woh unko nahi loan ka kuch malum nahi kya bol rahe the khud hi aur khud hi disconnect kar rahe hai phone.
Customer: Mere paas recording bhi hai main toh aage abhi send karunga.
Customer: Aur unko ek toh voice ka malum nahi chalta male hai ki female hai. Main main main bol raha hu sir sir hu sir hu fir bhi malum hi nahi kaha kaun se nakshe mein hai woh.
Executive: Toh IndiaMART ke through kyu aayega aapka loan ke liye aapka toh marble ka kaam hai na?
Customer: Haan ji meri baat suno.
Customer: Haan toh mujhe mujhe bol rahe hai na aapke number IndiaMART helpline number hai aapke number hai. Mere paas recording bhi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji boliye mam ek toh aap lead aa hi nahi rahi achhi.
Executive: Lead haan lead ki baat hai ye baki ye kya baat hai matlab ki ye loan wali mujhe samajh nahi aayi.
Customer: Are aapko call karke bola?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan ji ji IndiaMART walon ne.
Customer: Malum nahi India IndiaMART ke number hai bas ye malum hai mujhe.
Executive: Unhone call karke kya bola ki aap loan aapko loan ki requirement hai kya?
Customer: Haan ji ji aapka phone karke requirement nahi ki aapka loan ka woh ho gaya approve ho gaya sir receipt ho gayi loan utha sakte hai sab.
Customer: Fir khud hi bol rahe hai.
Customer: Sir voice koi koi voice nahi aa rahi disconnect kar rahe hai.
Executive: Are fraud call hote hai.
Executive: Kabhi kabhi fraud call kyuki aap online portal pe registered hai na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai toh aapko yaha pe aapka number vagera matlab show toh nahi hota hai lekin aapko jaise koi call karta hai waha se toh pata toh chal hi jaata hai ya kabhi bhi ho sakta hai kahi aapne kuch search varch kiya ho.
Customer: Toh meri baat suno IndiaMART wale kaise karenge fraud call?
Executive: IndiaMART wale nahi kar rahe hai koi call kar raha hai aapko IndiaMART ke naam pe.
Customer: Meri meri baat suno meri baat suno meri is number se IndiaMART wale.
Executive: Yaha par haan yaha par companiya registered hai yaha par companiya registered hai jo matlab loan vagera provide karti hai koi registered company are hum nahi de rahe aapka number unhone kahi se liya hoga directly.
Customer: Toh aap unko mere number.
Customer: Toh IndiaMART mein fir number secure nahi hote matlab logon ke?
Executive: Sir aapka number ya secured hai aapko jab call bhi aati hai toh aapko kisi ke personal number se call nahi aati aur aap jab call karte ho toh aapke aapka personal number bhi show nahi hota ek preferred number hai hamara wahi show hota hai logo ko.
Customer: Abhi main call karta karta hu jo mere number nahi jaate unke paas?
Executive: Nahi jab aap unko whatsapp pe agar connect karte ho message karte ho personally ya personally alag se call karte ho toh aapka number jayega agar aap IndiaMART ke lead manager mein jaake waha pe click karke ya send karke agar call karoge toh waha par ek preferred number hai rehta hai usi se call jaati hai aap PMS setting mein bhi dekh sakte ho.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: PMS settings jab open karoge toh waha par number rakh upar hi samne hi dikh raha hoga ki jab aap call karenge toh ye number jaa raha hai aapke buyer ke paas.
Customer: Sir woh theek hai mam.
Executive: Aap sir kafi sari cheeze chalate hoge na matlab IndiaMART ke alawa bhi aap social media ya kahi data leak hone mein kitni der matlab woh toh kahi se bhi number apne apne paas aate nahi hai call vagera.
Customer: Nahi woh sab woh toh kuch nahi ab ho gaya jo ho gaya lekin lead ki mam batao aap kya karu. Lead aa hi nahi rahi teen mahine ho gaye ek order nahi mila abhi tak.
Executive: Ji mere sir se baat hui woh bata rahe the ki matlab 30% convert nahi ho pa rahi hai aur 70% aise aa rahi hai jinko requirement nahi hai hai na correct?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Yahi toh hai abhi at present mein.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji ji mam boliye.
Executive: Main bol rahi hu aisa hai na ki matlab 70% kehte hai na jinko requirement nahi hai but 30% jinko requirement hai unse aapki deal convert nahi ho pa rahi hai competition ki wajah se.
Customer: Correct.
Customer: Competition sabse meri sab mere hisab se kam price meri hogi yaha pe makrana ke andar. Competition ka toh koi sawal hi nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi sir main woh toh seedhe hi bolte hai meri baat suno woh toh seedhe hi bolte hai ki humko lena hi nahi hai hamari requirement hi nahi hai toh fir matlab kya karte ho woh laga ke.
Customer: Main bol wohi toh keh rahi hu 60% aise log honge jinko requirement nahi hogi bache jo 30 40% log jinko requirement hai jaise kuch lead sold out ho ja rahi hai jaise past leads mein agar aap jaake dekhe kuch lead sold out ho rahi hai kuch woh kuch jinse aapki baat hui hogi lekin unki aur bhi kisi se hui hogi toh deal aapse na convert hoke kisi aur ke saath convert ho rahi hogi kahi na kahi jinko genuinely require hai bhi.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji aur calls aapko abhi ek bhi nahi aaye hai is month mein aur pichle month mein theek hai woh matlab sir ko bataya tha visibility ki wajah se ho raha hai kyuki aapki company matlab obviously services ke according listing rehti hai page pe toh direct calls upar walon ko hi zyada aate hai.
Customer: Toh matlab meri baat.
Executive: Hmm toh mere hisab se aapko package ghatana chahiye ye wala 33000 wala.
Executive: Sir dekho ek toh ye suggestion hai ki aap matlab thoda sa active raho.
Customer: Theek hai services pe.
Executive: Dusra aap na waha pe upar search karo keywords daal ke jo aapki leads sold out ho rahi hai agar aapko woh chahiye toh waha I am interested mark karo.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi ye maine meri baat suno.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye matlab mere saath alag hi fraud chal raha hai.
Customer: Main pura active hu uske andar subah se leke shaam tak theek hai na.
Executive: Sir leads toh sold out ho rahi hai na aapki aap sari leads sold out kar pa rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi meri baat suno hi nahi meri baat suno aap. Subah se leke shaam tak main active hu ek minute bhi matlab IndiaMART se bhi hata de. Aake bhi blink nahi ki theek hai na.
Customer: Main waha pe dekhta hu.
Customer: Jo lead ja chuki hai na waha pe dekhta hu toh waha pe mujhe malum chalta hai ki 10 minute pehle abhi gayi 2 minute pehle gayi but possible kaise hai ye.
Executive: Toh main sir se baat kar rahi thi 3 minute mein hi ek lead sold out ho gayi thi. Sir mujhse subah baat kar rahe the jab woh tabhi ek lead 3 minute mein sold out ho gayi thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi main aapko bol raha hu baat sahi hai meri baat aap main maan gaya jab main screen ke andar hu mere paas bhi aani chahiye na lead toh aayegi mere paas bhi.
Executive: Sir dikhti sabko hi hai yaha par sir bahut sari companies hai jinhone employees vagera bitha rakhe hote hai ek ek category ke liye.
Customer: Toh meri baat samajh nahi rahe aap main kya keh raha hu main khud bitha deta hu screen ke upar ek ek second bhi matlab aapke portal pe toh woh aa hi rahi hogi na.
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: Ab main aapko kaise vishwas dilau batao aap main toh khud karta hu main kaha yaar isse bhi lead abhi tak malum hi aayi toh mere paas.
Customer: Ye baat hoti hai ab aap bol rahe ho ki matlab jaati aap dhyan nahi dete lekin dhyan dete fir toh man hi nahi karta ki yaar IndiaMART ke andar package.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good quality buyleads.

- Customer received fraudulent loan calls.

- Leads are being sold out quickly.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer's concern about leads.

- Executive clarified IndiaMART is not involved in fraud calls.

- Executive explained how preferred numbers work.

- Executive suggested being active and using keywords.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fraud calls, subscription, visibility
